related:
  - title: "Teaching robots to think like us"
    excerpt: "In Applied Physics Letters, researchers outline how a robot could be taught to navigate through a maze by electrically stimulating a culture of brain nerve cells connected to the machine. These nerve cells were grown from living cells and acted as the physical reservoir for the computer to construct coherent signals."
    publishedDateTime: 2021-10-26T18:26:00Z
